Bio:
Also Eden are a 5-piece progressive rock band from the South-West UK, with music influences ranging from Genesis, Porcupine Tree, Yes and Marillion to music from the metal, fusion, classical and classic rock genres.

2010 saw the addition of the very talented Rich Harding on vocals - giving the band a new energy, sound, and direction - and with drummer Lee Nicholas completing the lineup in February 2011, this heralds an exciting new era for the band!

The bands 3rd album "Think of the Children" will be available Summer 2011.
